== Details == ===Description=== Hatch eggs faster ===Acquisition=== Catch 80 Unique Pok√©mon. ===Effects=== Level 0: x1.5 Eggs Hatching Speed, Level 1: x1.6 Eggs Hatching Speed, Level 2: x1.7 Eggs Hatching Speed, Level 3: x1.8 Eggs Hatching Speed, Level 4: x1.9 Eggs Hatching Speed, Level 5/MAX: x2.0 Eggs Hatching Speed, ===Upgrade Requirements=== Level 0 to 1 ??
